problems.title: Remove Duplicates From Array
problems.description: Write a Java program to remove duplicated values from an array. Print the unique elements in the order they first appear.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5
1 2 2 3 3

Sample Output
1 2 3

Sample Input
5
1 1 1 1 1

Sample Output
1
hintsList: Use a Set to store unique elements or sort the array.
